channel.title: Breakout Open Source! [Nintendo DS, DSL, DSi, DSiXL, 3DS]
channel.description:
This is a DS game I created. Full Source Located Below
Some images:
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg535/scaled.php?server=535&filename=ds1x.png&res=landing[/img]
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg69/scaled.php?server=69&filename=ds2l.png&res=landing[/img]
Download:
Comes with DS emulator so you can play
[URL=http://up.ht/LrvMBw]Breakout.zip - 447 KB[/URL]
Resources Download:
If you wish to look at all code you MUST download this!
[URL=http://up.ht/LrwGhs]Resources.zip - 895 KB[/URL]
